thoughts.text: I think I will use the `read_file` command to read the information that I stored in the file about the Deer Glen nature reserve and educational trail.
thoughts.reasoning: I chose this command because I want to access the information I stored in the file so that I can review it. The `read_file` command is a good option to read the information from the file.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the `write_to_file` command to write the information that I gathered from the website to a file.
- Use the `read_file` command to read the information from the file.
thoughts.criticism: I should have thought to use the `read_file` command earlier instead of trying to remember the information I gathered from the website.
thoughts.speak: I will use the `read_file` command to read the information that I stored in the file about the Deer Glen nature reserve and educational trail.
